overview: The last son of a shepherd is faced with the challenge of choosing between modernity and the family tradition of nomadic life. Faced with the toughest choice of choosing between tradition and modernity Suleiman, 13 is the youngest son of 80-year-old nomadic shepherd, Gafoor. He is the only hope of Gafoor who can carry forward his age-old tradition of rearing goats and sheep.
title: The Last Hope
